mapper.select: SELECT B.*, COUNT(*) OVER() CNT, C.CTG_NAME,D.CODE_NAME AS DFCLT_LEVEL_NAME FROM COM_BASKET A JOIN COM_QUESTION B ON B.QST_ID = A.QST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CATEGORY C ON C.CTG_ID = B.CTG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE D ON D.CODE_ID = B.DFCLT_LEVEL_CODE AND D.GROUP_CODE_ID='DFCLVL' /*난이도*/ WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.GRADE_CODE = #{gradeCode} AND A.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} ORDER BY A.QST_SORT
